name: ICICI Sample Credit Card
rewards:
Earn 2.5% Reward Points on international spends
Earn 2% Reward Points on domestic spends

feedback.comment: Decent cashback but customer service needs improvement
Great rewards program, totally worth it!

additionalDetails.rewardsProgram: Flat 2% cashback on all spends, credited monthly
additionalDetails.welcomeBonus: ₹1,000 cashback on spending ₹25,000 in first 30 days
milestoneBenefits: Annual fee waiver on spending ₹3,00,000 in a year
additionalDetails.airportLounge: 2 complimentary domestic lounge visits per quarter
additionalDetails.fuelSurcharge: Complete fuel surcharge waiver at all fuel stations
additionalDetails.movieBenefits: 25% off on movie tickets up to ₹100 per ticket
diningPrivileges: 10% cashback at restaurants up to ₹200 per transaction
